name: Randuin's Omen
simpleDescription: Greatly increases defenses, activate to slow nearby enemies

passives.name: Resilience
passives.effects: Reduces incoming damage from {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} by 30%.

active.name: Humility
active.effects: Unleash a shockwave around you that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies by 70% for 2 seconds.
